import {Iztrolabe} from "react-iztro"

function App() {
  return (
    <div className="App" style={{ width: 1024, margin: '50px auto', boxShadow: '0 0 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.25)'}}>
      <Iztrolabe 
        birthday="2003-10-12" 
        birthTime={1}

        gender="male" 
        horoscopeDate={new Date()} // æ–°å¢å‚æ•°ï¼Œè®¾ç½®è¿é™æ—¥æœŸ [å¯é€‰ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸ºå½“å‰æ—¶é—´]

      />
    </div>
  );
}

export default App;
